name: Chub Chub Goes to Candy Land
name_original: Chub Chub Goes to Candy Land
description:
This was my first attempt at working on a project with my brother.  He did the art and I did the programming and music.  It didn't go very smoothly and we only got a little bit of what we were planning on doing finished but it was fun and I hope to work on stuff with him more.

The use of the theme in this game was that everything is spread out and instead of there being lots of small enemies to fight there are only a few big ones.

The camp fires give you health and act as a checkpoint.

To win the game you must collect 4 gears.

I'm hoping that we'll continue to work on this and expand it.

This was made for HeartJam
